clearAll.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to clear all cache entries? This action cannot be undone.
clearAll.description: Remove all cached entries. Use with caution.
clearAll.title: Clear All Cache

invalidateKey.description: Remove a specific cache entry by its exact key
invalidateKey.title: Invalidate by Key

invalidatePattern.description: Remove all cache entries matching a pattern (supports wildcards)
invalidatePattern.title: Invalidate by Pattern

result.allInvalidated: All cache entries have been cleared
result.title: Success
